reviews.name: Samuel Reed
reviews.comment: The area was perfect for families. It had enough space for kids to play and adults to relax. The maintenance staff did a great job keeping it clean and welcoming.

reviews.name: R4F4
reviews.comment:
What to say about the Civic Center?

What an amazing park and leisure area that offers green grass areas to lay down and relax and many tables and chairs to take a break during work. Make sure you take the time and read what the park was built for.

I highly recommend it!

reviews.name: Fil Lorinc
reviews.comment: The natural elements and the water feature are nice but the grounds are frequented by displaced individuals so this can create somewhat of a clash for folks that aren't used to it.

reviews.name: TJ Smith
reviews.comment: I thought it was going to be super nice however it is was full of unhoused people hanging out. I'm glad they have a spot to go

reviews.name: Kenia L
reviews.comment: It's comfortable and visually pleasing, however, I thought it would be much bigger, but in reality it's too small, but if you just want to sit for a while, I guess you'll enjoy it.

reviews.name: Tracy Torbett
reviews.comment: We visited 4/20/19 in the early evening.  It was a refreshing place to enjoy some greenery and watch the city of Dallas. A street performer was playing guitar nearby which added to the allure.  Within walking distance to many hotels downtown, donâ€™t miss this beautiful spot!

reviews.name: Natalie Jaroszewski
reviews.comment:
Very small, but cute. I liked it enough to take some of my civic wedding photos there. :)
Of course it is right in the middle of major streets, so not a good pet area.
There a few picnic tables, and the butterfly statues are cool for kids.

reviews.name: Abhilasha A Rathi
reviews.comment: Such a fun place to go anytime. Kids enjoy water splash.PlaygroundIt's good space for kids to run around.RestroomsNo restroomsDog-friendlinessYesPicnic areaIt's a very comfortable place for picnic only on good weather days.

reviews.name: Lawrence Mendoza
reviews.comment: A great place to take a stroll or just sit. It is also a dog friendly park. It is overall a very good place to go to enjoy the scenery.

reviews.name: Melissa Anderson
reviews.comment: Not a bad view  anyway you look. Love this park. Just one more reason I  am  blessed  to call Dallas home! +5

reviews.name: Matthew L
reviews.comment: So very peaceful brought my cat he loved it will definitely go again very soon ðŸ˜Š â€¦

reviews.name: Carlo Esposito
reviews.comment: Itâ€™s a nice walk in the park in downtown Dallas! Just beware of not stepping in dog droppings as some people will not pick up after their pets.

reviews.name: Hany Ramzy
reviews.comment: Itâ€™s the kinda pretty that makes you wanna call your grandma and tell her about it.

reviews.name: Rich Paxton
reviews.comment: Beautiful at night. Fountains in the center is a great way to entertain the kids on a hot day. But too many homeless people hanging out in the table area.

reviews.name: Dmitriy Mykalo
reviews.comment: Civic Garden is a beautiful and serene park with well-maintained gardens and a peaceful atmosphere. The interactive fountain is a highlight, and the park's layout is perfect for a relaxing stroll. It's a great spot to unwind and enjoy nature in the city.

reviews.name: Gary Thompson
reviews.comment: Good spot to eat lunch after spending time in the courthouse!

reviews.name: Anand Arya
reviews.comment: Nice park, needs some cleanliness. People need to stop throwing trash outside the trash bin.

reviews.name: Veronika Pliusnina
reviews.comment: Very nice place to refresh yourself while being outside. Not crowded at all

reviews.name: Rich KR
reviews.comment: Small park in Downtown Dallas.  Perfect for a short rest or relaxation.  Lots of benches plus a green oasis of vegetation give a sense of peace.

reviews.name: Henry Yoder
reviews.comment: Very cool lights and a nice place to chill downtown.

reviews.name: Don Muchow
reviews.comment: Nice shady spot in downtown Dallas with picnic tables and water fountain and flowers.

reviews.name: Amilcar Lopez
reviews.comment: Great place to visit......

reviews.name: Angel XXX
reviews.comment: We went and enjoyed the scenery early morning. Was nice and peaceful. The water, people walking dogs. A couple of homeless wandering around but super friendly and everyone minds their own business. ALOT of security walks through to give you the safety feel. Also many people cleaning the park. A new spot

reviews.name: Seth Salamanca
reviews.comment: Nice place to enjoy a lunch. +3

reviews.name: J A
reviews.comment: Nice and chill place to walk around

reviews.name: Alin Guadarrama
reviews.comment: Beautiful at night it has a show with the water fountains it goes with the beat of the song itâ€™s really pretty and the playgrounds look so much fun I wish I was little to play there jaja

reviews.name: Ms. Qweenie Smith Davis
reviews.comment: My honey took me to see the butterflies!! Such a great place and so romantic!!

reviews.name: Erin Lux
reviews.comment: Nice place to eat a picnic lunch in the middle of town

reviews.name: Kkey Hicks
reviews.comment: The homeless population has really taken over

reviews.name: Heiderose Reed
reviews.comment: I didn't
